Title: CSS3 based MenuBar control
Description: It is a simple Horizontal MenuBar control totally based on CSS3. No Javascript or JQuery. Light and fast. Should work in all modern browsers.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

It is a simple Horizontal MenuBar web control totally based on CSS3. No Javascript or JQuery. Light and fast. Should work in all modern browsers.
A CSS3 based horizontal MenuBar custom web control

It is a custom horizontal menubar web control. It can be setup by the web page developer in 3 ways:

- On design time: using collection tags for the names

- On runtime: attaching an xml.

Code behind:

- On runtime: creating a menubar structure with the internal menubar web control MenuBarItems object.


It adds postbackhandling with commandnames, to identify which menu is clicked by the user.

- Some additional flexibility to the menubar is provided with custom properties to allow for custom styling of the menuBar, such as font, colors, and size.
